bool CMQProducer::Open ( const char *  pszDestinationName,
bool  bUseTopic = false 
)

Summary: Called to open the connection to the ActiveMQ broker

Parameters:

  • pszDestinationName - The name of the destination queue/topic
  • bUseTopic - true to use topic destination instead of queue

Returns: true if successful

bool CMQProducer::Send ( const char *  pszMessage,
const char *  pszCorrelationID,
const char *  pszStrPropName,
const char *  pszStrPropValue 
)

Summary: Called to send the requested message

Parameters:

  • pszMessage - the message to be sent
  • pszCorrelationID - the id used to manage the response
  • pszStrPropName - optional string property name added to request
  • pszStrpropValue - optional string property value added to request

Returns: true if successful

Summary: Called to set the link to the owner MQ wrapper object

Parameters:

  • pMQWrapper - the wrapper object that owns this consumer

Returns: None

Summary: Called to set the consumer to which responses should be sent
